message:
CRITICAL FIX: Save entries to database when authenticated

Changes:
- handleSaveToday now database-aware:
  * Authenticated: saves to database via saveSession()
  * Guest: saves to localStorage (original behavior)
- Generates session name: "YYYY-MM-DD - FirstLine"
- Added error handling with red toast notification

This was the fatal bug preventing authenticated users from saving entries.
The save was going to localStorage while calendar/reflections read from database.
